name: Mass Vector
description: Mass Vector. A physics based game with 100 levels of challenging fun. 50 Speed levels played against the clock. 50 Hazard levels which are a real challenge of skill and stamina.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL supported DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Ensure graphics drivers and DirectX are up to date.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Core i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Open GL supported DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Ensure graphics drivers and DirectX are up to date.
